hint_jp:
【攻略ヒント】1、2回目のアピールチャンスは、短い間にSP特技を発動する必要があるので注意しよう。
各アピールチャンスでSP特技を発動できるようにSPゲージをためてみよう
hint_en: [Hint] You will need to activate your SP Skill on short notice during the first and second Appeal Chances, so watch out. Make sure you charge your gauge so that you can activate your SP Skill during all of the Appeal Chances.

effect.display: Gain 10% of SP capacity as SP Gauge
effect.formatting: Gain {effect} of SP capacity as SP Gauge

appeal_chances.name_jp: SP特技で合計5,000ボルテージを獲得する
appeal_chances.name_en: Gain a total of 5,000 Voltage with SP Skills.
